price: Kuma kamar haka ne Muka yi wahayin abin karãntãwa (Alƙur'ãni) na Lãrabci zuwa gare ka, dõmin ka yi gargaɗi ga Uwar Alƙaryu (Makka) da wanda ke a kẽwayenta, kuma ka yi gargaɗi game da rãnar taruwa, bãbu shakka gare ta, wata ƙungiya tanã a cikin Aljanna kuma wata ƙungiya tãna a cikin sa'ĩr.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا لِّتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَتُنذِرَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡجَمۡعِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ فَرِيقٞ فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَفَرِيقٞ فِي ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
